compatibility.notes: The Artistic-1.0-cl8 license is compatible with other permissive licenses, but incompatible with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Insert a prominent notice in each changed file stating how and when you changed that file.

Make modifications Freely Available by posting to Usenet or an equivalent medium, placing on a major archive site, or allowing the Copyright Holder to include them in the Standard Version of the Package.
license.name: Artistic-1.0-cl8
obligations: Insert a prominent notice in each changed file stating how and when you changed that file.

Do at least ONE of the following: place your modifications in the Public Domain, make them Freely Available, use the modified Package only within your corporation or organization, rename non-standard executables and provide separate manual pages, or make other distribution arrangements with the Copyright Holder.
